review:
Dr Puneet is one of the most rare doctors you can find if you are suffering from a hip pain or arthritis
** ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** **** he is cool , calm and take care of you like no ther doc does. 
Been 2 years since my successful surgery and still he is always here whenever i need him for any advise. 
He is a highly recommended ( Prof ) Doctor.
*** ** ** ** *** **** *** ****

Gunjan is a neurology patient she met an unfortunate bone fracture , we met Dr. Puneet for consultation , the way we were explained about how the injury would have happened and what is recommended further was much easy to understand.
Dr. Puneet not just explained us but took the case to in his hand to treat her for her speedy recovery .
Being a profesional doctor he also a grate human being who understand not just the patient but the patients family member as well , there economical condition and suggests the best  and support in all possible way he can.

We thank Puneet sir on behalf of Gunjan and family members.
And we highly recomend Dr. Puneet , to all who want there near and dear one to be treated well .
Last 4 months back my mother in law knee replacement by dr. Puneet mishra...he such a wonderful doctor..he is very helpful, kind-hearted, clam.. he is a nice human being...god always bless you...
